name: Trever Keith
description:
'''Trever Keith''' (born May 28, 1969) is an American musician, producer and record label owner from [[Victorville, California]], United States. He is the founding member of the So-Cal punk group [[Face to Face (punk band)|Face to Face]] and has been the [[singing|singer]] and [[guitarist]] of the band since their inception in 1991. Keith is also the owner and founder of the independent record labels Lady Luck Records, Antagonist Records and Folsom Records.

Outside of his work with Face to Face, Keith was also a part of the remix and mash-up duo [[The Legion of Doom (mash up group)|The Legion of Doom]] and alternative rock group [[Viva Death]].  Additionally, in February 2008 he released a solo album titled ''Melancholics Anonymous''.
